sentences.sentence: My mama always said, "You got to put the past behind you before you can move on."
sentences.translation: 我妈妈总说：“你得丢开以往的事，才能不断继续前进。”

sentences.sentence: All cowardice comes from not loving or not loving well, which is the same thing.
sentences.translation: 所有的懦弱都出自于不爱或爱得不彻底，这两者一样。

sentences.sentence: A minute on the lips, a lifetime on the hips.
sentences.translation: 嘴上一时享受，臀上一世肥肉。

sentences.sentence: Never wasting an hour, never letting one moment go cold.
sentences.translation: 不要虚度光阴，即使是一瞬，也要用力把握。
